mapper.select: SELECT outbound_id, outbound_lot, outbound_number, outbound_date, memo, outbound_manager FROM outbound ORDER BY outbound_id
SELECT outbound_detail_id, outbound_id, warehouse_id, prod_id, outbound_quantity FROM outbound_detail WHERE outbound_id = #{outboundId}
SELECT DISTINCT outbound_id FROM outbound ORDER BY outbound_id
